bio: Great evening up at Birmingham city Academy with FWA U7s and two FWA U8 teams. The boys really put on a performance and gave 100 percent. Some great individual and team performances. Big thank you yo Birmingham City Academy for hosting us and giving the boys a great experience and opportunity. . . . . #footworksacademy #birminghamcity #tekkerz #showcase #tallent #grassroots #elite #matches #games #experience
